title: Let Me Live: Episode 2 - I'll Take It
description:
The second episode of Drama's webseries, Let Me Live. It's Drama's birthday this time and you can't really beat waking up and getting a Gallardo. The annual Young & Reckless Prom was better than ever, featuring many familiar faces. Comment if you recognize any!

Intro Music - "We Don't Know" - D-WHY

- Music In Video -
Dillon Francis - Bootleg Fireworks (Burning Up)
KYLE - Silver Platter
Madeon - The City
Hoodie Allen - Eighteen

Edited by Blake Anderson
Shot by Tyler Diamond and Blake Anderson

asset.author: Young & Reckless
